Package agents

Class Collector

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.Agent
      • agents.Collector
  • public class Collector
extends Agent
    Collector class extending the Agent object. The collector is the main acting agent in this, it maps rubbish, optimises its TSP route, then actions the path
    Author:
    Felix

        public repast.simphony.space.continuous.ContinuousSpace<java.lang.Object> space

    • Constructor Detail

      • Collector

        public Collector​(repast.simphony.space.continuous.ContinuousSpace<java.lang.Object> space,
                 repast.simphony.space.grid.Grid<java.lang.Object> grid,
                 int speed,
                 int viewDistance,
                 boolean removeAllRubbish,
                 int populationSize,
                 int maxIterations,
                 double generationalGap,
                 int dos,
                 int iom,
                 int maxMapIterations)
        Constructor to instantiate the variables
        Parameters:
        space - The ContinuousSpace projection
        grid - The Grid Projection
        speed - The distance this agent can move by when moving in either the map or action states
        viewDistance - The distance the collector can see for when mapping out rubbish in the Map phase
        removeAllRubbish - A boolean flag to denote whether or not the Collector collects all rubbish it encounters in the Action phase, regardless of its inclusion in its optimised route
        populationSize - The number of individuals in the MA population
        maxIterations - The maximum number of iterations/epochs the GA will run for
        generationalGap - Double variable denoting the percentage of those in the MA population that are replaced by fitter offspring
        dos - The Depth of Search parameter for hill climbing
        iom - The Intensity of Mutation parameter for mutation heuristics
        maxMapIterations - The number of iterations in a MAP_STATE of the collector
